emotional_clarity_seeking.description: Attempts to understand, label, and make sense of emotional states.
emotional_clarity_seeking.activation: Triggered when emotions feel confusing, mixed, or overwhelming.

emotional_suppression.description: Minimizes or compresses emotional expression to maintain control or avoid vulnerability.
emotional_suppression.activation: Triggered by judgment, conflict, exposure, or fear of losing composure.

emotional_discharge.description: Releases emotional pressure through expression, action, or catharsis.
emotional_discharge.activation: Triggered by buildup of emotional intensity, injustice, or relational overwhelm.
behaviors: physical activity to burn through emotion
rapid shifts in tone or intensity

soothing_and_equilibrium.description: Seeks emotional grounding, comfort, or stabilization when overwhelmed.
soothing_and_equilibrium.activation: Triggered by stress, uncertainty, or emotional overload.
